introduction: AI Virtual Try-On enables users to upload images of clothing so that the AI generates images of models wearing those clothes. It is available on the Shopify platform.
features: AI generates images of models wearing the clothes
targetPeople: E-commerce businesses, fashion designers, online retailers

faqs.question: What is AI Virtual Try-On?
faqs.answer: AI Virtual Try-On enables users to upload images of clothing so that the AI generates images of models wearing those clothes.

faqs.question: How does AI Virtual Try-On work?
faqs.answer: Simply select your outfit type, choose your desired model, upload an image of the clothing, and process. Our AI will work its magic, generating over 30 images showcasing your design on the model with different poses.

faqs.question: Are the images generated by AI Virtual Try-On realistic?
faqs.answer: Yes, the images produced by AI Virtual Try-On are designed to be realistic and visually accurate. Our AI technology ensures that the clothing items seamlessly integrate with our model, resulting in lifelike representations that closely resemble actual photographs.

faqs.question: How many images will AI Virtual Try-On generate for one run?
faqs.answer: One run will generate more than 30 output images. So that you can choose the best pose to use as your product display.

faqs.question: Is AI Virtual Try-On available on Shopify?
faqs.answer: Yes, The Alter AI Virtual Try-On app is available on the Shopify platform. You can install it from your Shopify admin profile and use it to manage your product displays.

faqs.question: Is AI Virtual Try-On available on other e-commerce platforms?
faqs.answer: No, the Alter AI Virtual Try-On app is currently not available for other e-commerce platforms. However, you can still use this website to generate your product displays.
